title: Ripton’s New Winter Time Overalls
content: We’re big fans of Ripton’s athletic denim. Their shorts quickly became a favorite over here and with winter months approaching, the brand wants to get you in a pair of their overalls in time for your winter activities. New for this year are women’s overalls in a “Drift” wash and men’s in “Astro Navy“. Check them out at Ripton!
author: prolly
